extendedInfo.description: Cisco Certified Network Professional (CCNP) validates the ability to plan, implement, verify and troubleshoot local and wide-area enterprise networks and work collaboratively with specialists on advanced security, voice, wireless and video solutions. The CCNP certification is appropriate for those with at least one year of networking experience who are ready to advance their skills and work independently on complex network solutions. Those who achieve CCNP have demonstrated the skills required in enterprise roles such as network technician, support engineer, systems engineer or network engineer.APP FEATURESThis is a great application that allows candidate to practice for the Cisco CCNPcertification exam. There are three main functions focusing on program:TrainingThe questions are categorized according to the courses in the CCNP program to strengthen candidates' knowledgeIn this section, candidate can choose the number of questions in order or random, set the countdown timer for each practicing item.ExamCandidate will have the opportunity to test with the number of questions in the same time as the CCNA exam. After completing, the result will be notified immediatelyHistoryCandidate can review the result of previous examSpeed up your career and get your CCNP certification easier with the CCNP training application as your guide.If you have any problems, please kindly contact us via feedback feature in theapplication.EXAMS & RECOMMENDED TRAININGRequired Exam(s)642-902 ROUTE642-813 SWITCH642-832 TSHOOTRecommended TrainingImplementing Cisco IP Routing (ROUTE)Implementing Cisco IP Switched Networks (SWITCH)Troubleshooting and Maintaining Cisco IP Networks (TSHOOT)
